33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar narrated that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:"In Thaqif there will be a great liar and destroyer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ " فِي ثَقِيفٍ كَذَّابٌ وَمُبِيرٌ "
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Liar And Destroyer From Thaqif
